column4: hey guys, every time i click the properites of a file i get an error saying nautilus has quit unexpectedly. any ideas as to whats going on?
any help guys?
every time i click the properites of a file i get an error saying nautilus has quit unexpectedly. any ideas as to whats going on?
Are you on Breezy or Dapper?
breezy
k
it seems to do this when i click try to view properites of media files
Does this apply only for media files?
it seems to
Are the media types supported under your setup?
yes they are
currently its doing this with a .mov file
hang on a sec, I'll try it out myself
alrighty
.mov files aren't supported by the default applications AFAIK... I'm using VLC to view them.
This might make a difference.
Nope - I get the same error message you did.
well that must be it then, i was trying to change the default app to open the file to vlc
thanks so much for clearing that up for me
I can't find anything like this in the forums, so I'll file a bug report now.
thanks alot, and yeah nothing in the forums
